result.markdown:
::: {.question} **Valuation and Ownership After Equity Issuance** Erica owns all **4 million shares** of her company, CoralTech. A new partner is offering to invest **1.737 million** in exchange for **1.5 million shares**. ::: {.question-block}
1. What is the post-money valuation (in million)?
✅ Post-money = (5.5) shares × $1.158 (1.737/ 1.5) = **6.369 million**
::: ::: {.question-block}
2. What percentage of the company will the new partner own?
✅ Partner Ownership = 1.5 / 5.5 × 100 = **27.273%**
::: :::
